main.name: Central Dispensary
main.description: Wherever the art of Medicine is loved, there is also a love of Humanity
main.bio: Hi there!  I'm doctor  Nuwan Srimal Jayasundara  graduated  in MBBS degree on 01/11/2018 from  faculty of medicine , Kothelawala Defense University (KDU).Then I started my internship  at General hospital ,Matara on 06/04/2019 as an intern medical officer .And I have completed my internship on 06/04/2020. I have obtained the registration of Sri Lanka medical council  as a preliminary  grade medical officer on 06/04/2020. My SLMC registration number is 38791.After that I got my first appointment at Navy General Hospital , Colombo for one year.Since then I am working as a Medical officer at Navy General Hospital  East, Trincomalee. I have upgraded as a Grade II medical officer on 06/04/2022.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if in case !

work.title: Intern Medical Officer
work.description: Get experienced by serving to the patients as an Intern - Medical Officer

work.title: Medical Officer
work.description: Upgraded as a Grade II Medical Officer

testimonials.text: Dr. Jayasundara is a great doctor! He’s very understanding and listens to your concerns. He takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues! I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a specialist

Great experience! Made a same day appointment on Central dispensary - Athurigiriya and got in right away. The front desk staff and the medical assistant were very nice and helpful. Dr. Nuwan Jayasundara was great, gave realistic expectations and timelines. I will definitely be back and would recommend the practice!

Great experience as a first timer. I barely waited to be helped when I checked in. The staff and Dr. N.S. Jayasundara were all very friendly and helpful. I especially loved how Dr. N.S. Jayasundara really took his time to explain my conditions with me as well as my treatment options. I had a great visit and the doctor’s demeanor has really put me at ease so I highly recommend this clinic.
